name: Shoggoth
description: The Shoggoth is a massive, amorphous entity with many mouths emitting cacophonous sounds. It possesses a gelatinous appearance and can easily squeeze through tight spaces.
memorable: Its ability to absorb fallen foes’ bodies and create chaos on the battlefield with its hideous cacophony makes it a terrifying presence.
goals: To decimate its foes and disrupt their resurrection efforts.
relations: Often encountered alongside other chaotic creatures or aberrations.
environment: Likely found in dark, chaotic, or ancient locations.
strengths: High hit points and resistances to several damage types make it a durable opponent.
attacks: The Shoggoth can make four powerful Slam attacks in a single turn, grappling smaller creatures.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to absorb the bodies of its victims, preventing them from being resurrected except by powerful spells.
senses: Keen hearing and smell grant it advantage on Perception checks related to those senses.
skills: Exceptional at noticing hidden creatures or environmental changes, with a Perception skill modifier of +11.
additional_information: Does not require air due to its anaerobic nature.
Disorients creatures with its hideous cacophony, potentially incapacitating them.
Can alter its form for only one round when subjected to shape-altering spells.
test_queries: massive chaotic creature with many mouths
gelatinous being that disrupts enemies in combat
huge amorphous monster with disorienting sounds
strong and resistant creature in dark environments
